mapper.select: select ssll.id AS id, ssll.staff_id AS staffId, ssll.grade_id AS gradeId, ssll.academic_year_semester_id AS academicYearSemesterId, ss.name AS subjectName, ss.id AS subjectId, sst.name AS leaderName, (select ifnull(group_concat(distinct sslt.staff_id),'') from sys_staff_lesson_teacher sslt where sslt.subject_id=subjectId and sslt.clazz_id in (select id from sys_clazz where grade_id=#{gradeId} and academic_year_semester_id=#{academicYearSemesterId}) and sslt.is_current='YES') AS staffIds from sys_staff_lesson_leader ssll left join sys_subject ss on ss.id=ssll.subject_id left join sys_staff sst on sst.id=ssll.staff_id where ssll.grade_id=#{gradeId} and ssll.academic_year_semester_id=#{academicYearSemesterId} and ssll.is_current='YES' and ss.is_main='YES'
